page.title: 19MUSIC WE LIKE
page.content: A pop group is a group of people who sing or play musical instruments. A pop group is usually made up of a lead singer, a person playing a synthesizer, a keyboard player & a backing group. (A backing group is a group of people who don't sing the song but they echo words and hum). In{1984 WHAM!}were a very successful pop group. They had a number of hit records, one of which was{Wake me up {before you go-go}.{WHAM!}has 2 lead singers; they are{George Michael}& {Andrew Ridgley . }Andrew plays an electric guitar as well. Some of the older generation prefer{ {Classical music}. Some people like{ {Rock'n'roll}and other people like{ {Country and western}. In Bulphan we have a band; they are called{Silver {Lining}and are run by Richard's father.
